typography, making connections. telling stories. thoughtful design. this is what we love.

Since 1995, Metadog Design Group has developed design strategies that result in the highest quality of communication. We create identity systems, packaging, annual reports, magazines, books, promotional materials, art installations, film titles, and digital graphics.
